--- title: ST4SD Cloud --- import { CodeSyntax } from '@carbon/pictograms-react'; import { NetworkServices } from '@carbon/pictograms-react'; import { CarbonForIbmDotcom } from '@carbon/pictograms-react'; import { Kubernetes } from '@carbon/pictograms-react'; import { Connect } from '@carbon/pictograms-react'; import { Transform_02 } from '@carbon/pictograms-react'; import { Analyze } from '@carbon/pictograms-react'; import { Process } from '@carbon/pictograms-react'; import { AccessManagement } from '@carbon/pictograms-react'; import { KnowsDarkData } from '@carbon/pictograms-react'; import { Security_02 } from '@carbon/pictograms-react'; import { Renew } from '@carbon/pictograms-react'; **ST4SD Cloud** creates, and maintains, robust and secure deployments of ST4SD on OpenShift. It is built on cutting edge technologies for deploying and managing complex applications. Anyone with knowledge of Kubernetes/OpenShift administration can use ST4SD Cloud to deploy ST4SD on an OpenShift cluster. ## Why ST4SD Cloud ?
} > Install ST4SD technologies on OpenShift and automatically keep them up-to-date using the Operator Lifecycle Manager (OLM) framework. } > The toolkit leverages industry standard mechanisms for authentication and authorization provided by OpenShift. } > The roles and permissions of all technologies installed with ST4SD Cloud have been carefully engineered to meet stringent criteria for security. } > The Workflow Operator enables management of virtual experiments as first class Kubernetes objects.
## Try it yourself Add the **Simulation Toolkit for Scientific Discovery (ST4SD)** operator to the Operator Catalog of your OpenShift cluster: ``` oc apply -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/st4sd/st4sd-olm/main/examples/deploy.yaml ``` Then follow our instructions to configure and install ST4SD: ST4SD Core, ST4SD Services, ST4SD Registry all managed by ST4SD Cloud. ## Learn More
} > If you have access to an OpenShift cluster, follow our [instructions](/installation#install-on-kubernetes-and-openshift) to install ST4SD Cloud using OLM. You may also [install](/installation#install-on-openshift-local) a scaled down version of ST4SD Cloud on Red Hat OpenShift Local. } > [Manage](/cloud-manage-users) the access permissions of users in your ST4SD Cloud instance using standard Kubernetes mechanisms. } > A brief overview of the ST4SD Cloud [architecture](/cloud-architecture).
## Accelerate your simulation research with ST4SD Check out these other ST4SD technologies. All are designed to work together to provide a powerful platform for simulation.
}> **ST4SD Core** enables writing virtual experiments that can run on your laptop, on HPC machines, or on cloud. [Get Started](/st4sd-core-getting-started) }> **ST4SD Registry** provides a UI for sharing and browsing virtual experiments. [Get Started](/st4sd-registry-getting-started) }> **ST4SD Services** allows scientists to run virtual experiments and query their data via Jupyter notebooks. It includes a high-performance metadata-store that enables memoization. [Get Started](/st4sd-services-getting-started)
